segments.text: I notice the little boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined, even though that stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched like she’s begging for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids always find a way to get what they want, even if it’s risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, and that makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she’s just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a comedy of errors in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will share the cookies or keep them all for himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, and I can’t help but root for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments that will be funny later.
segments.speaker: PAR
